titles.title: SAFE Bridges Act of 2019
To direct the Secretary of Transportation to assist States to rehabilitate or replace certain bridges, and for other purposes.
SAFE Bridges Act of 2019
Strengthen And Fortify Existing Bridges Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Strengthen And Fortify Existing Bridges Act of 2019 or the SAFE Bridges Act of 2019
This bill directs the Department of Transportation to establish a program to assist states to rehabilitate or replace bridges found to be structurally deficient.
States shall use program funds for projects to rehabilitate and replace such bridges and to maintain their surface coating and corrosion protection systems.
